titles.title: A resolution commemorating 90 years of U.S.-Polish diplomatic relations, during which Poland has proven to be an exceptionally strong partner to the United States in advancing freedom around the world.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S175)
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
1/7/2009--Introduced.
Celebrates the 90th anniversary of U.S.-Polish diplomatic relations. Congratulates the Polish people on their great accomplishments as a democracy. Expresses appreciation for Poland's steadfast partnership with the United States.
